ESPublicQuery.SQL:
SELECT ESFITradeAccount.Code AS Code, ESFITradeAccount.Name AS Name, FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1.TaxRegistrationNumber AS TaxRegistrationNumber FROM ESFITradeAccount AS ESFITradeAccount LEFT JOIN ESGOPerson AS FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1 ON ESFITradeAccount.fPersonCodeGID = FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1.GID WHERE (ESFITradeAccount.fCompanyCode = ##(ESCOMPANY)) AND (ESFITradeAccount.Type = 0) AND (ESFITradeAccount.Inactive = 0)
ORDER BY ESFITradeAccount.Code
